title: Post your OP.GG link and Lets Help each other out
body:
Post your link so other players can give you advice , if they see a pattern of a champion you do really well on consistently, a role you should try and play more of or any advice in general you think could help that player . Lets make this community awesome i'll start this is mine

http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=OzRoy

replies.body:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Lord+Vader+Kush

Just went through an agonizing 7 loss streak. Advice would be greatly appreciated, no flaming though pls.

I constantly move from NA to OCE because of traveling so here are my links for both, i'm currently in NA.

OCE:
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=i+mid+andi+carry

NA:
http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=i+mid+andi+carry

I just went 1/9 with lucian D: Mf brand lane op
no.... you were supposed to change your user name to "i adc andi carry" jeez

Get botrk + phantom for vayne.
Get hat for katarina.

https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=The+cryopheonix 
Cause why not lol. I've been playing a lot of king poro game mode xD I'm bad as well rofl
